categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic locations

nodes.text: Horox III was a location deep in the Outer Rim Territories where the Alliance to Restore the Republic established a temporary outpost. Luke Skywalker traveled to a cantina on Horox III sometime after his mission to an unidentified planet. Whilst in the cantina, he got into a fight with a pair of Sabat. Sometime later the outpost was destroyed by Task Force 99.
